com.how_hard_can_it_be.hex
Class HexPoint

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.Point2D
      java.awt.Point
          com.how_hard_can_it_be.hex.HexPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class HexPoint
extends java.awt.Point

Designates a single hex in a HexCanvas, as follows:

x is the column offset from the leftmost column of hexes
y is the hex offset from the topmost hex in the column designated by x.
So, (1,0) is the topmost hex in the 2nd-from-left column, and (0,1) is the 2nd hex from the top in the leftmost column.

Author:
John
